title: IT Env - SETUP DATE FOR CTRL-M REGARDING PLAN

task_list.instruction_title:
Using below listed date, please create the Workorder and assign to SPOC_Exp team to setup the batches Ctrl M dates for CSD.

For EOD on 31.03.2025 using below dates:
Calendar date    - 31.03.2025
Business date (Batch Date) – 31.03.2025

For EOW using below dates:
Calendar date    - 31.03.2025
Business date (Batch Date) – 31.03.2025

For EOD ((After Mig) on 16.04.2025 use below dates
Calendar date    - 31.03.2025
Business date (Batch Date) – 31.03.2025




Check [PRE-13539-2](PRE-13539-2_116109614.html) for consistency
